name: Coom Eternal 2.0
description:
A Doom eternal Mechanics based project

It still in development, I am making it just for fun tho.

Now they are robots instead of demons :D, but you only have just a robot

and he cant be killed, he is just there

if you want me to include some more stuff in this game tell in the comments

W,,A,S,D  -  Move

E  -  lil bomb (you can use to jump a little higher)

Shift  -  Dash
